package.name: CamScripts
package.description: CamScripts macros create and configure *every* step of FreeCAD CAM process.
package.author: spanner888

workbench.name: TEST
workbench.description: Library to import Tool data, create ToolBits and add to current Library Tool Table. Library to automate all CAM steps to create a Job, Operations, ToolControllers, Sanity report postprocessed gcode and calculate Spindle RPM from Tool and Stock material properties. Many key properties are set to provide realistic FreeCAD Job and gcode. All CAM steps to create a Job, Operations, ToolControllers, Sanity check report, postprocessed gcode and calculate Speeds and Feeds from Tool and Stock material properties. Additonal demonstration of Materials Machinability model to provide data for Speeds and Feeds, including exploring of fz (chipload) tables.

library.name: JobUtils
library.description: Path workbench utility functions to aid in job and tool controller scripting.
